title: Hilarious
review: The end of the movie was hilarious. Some guys face morphs into Al Pacinos face Hahahahaha. So dumb

title: Great movie obviously
review: No complaints here. Fun,entertaining,action packed, and emotional towards the end

title: The Iron giant but different.
review: They sure did make sure the giant was smaller in this one. Also he was a man and not a giant robot. Oh well.

title: Pretty good.
review: I liked it. It's no masterpiece. I laughed a couple of times but it isn't a comedy. Drama with a light tone and a serious subject manner. acting is pretty good, especially crickets acting.

title: This is crazy!
review: For the opening of the movie credits they used the same font they used in Jurassic park................................... then I see the guy who is playing the bass player ........it's the kid from Jurassic Park. Are you kidding me!!!???? That is nuts?!!! Wet sloppy nuts!!!

title: Best one yet!
review: This is the most unique one yet. Freddy seems to be done with haunting kids dreams because he has claws on both hands and is now a shy boy because the kid that was eaten by the bed has merged with Freddy and is now called Edward.

title: We're back!
review: The gang of Dino's return to get there revenge and have a few new tricks up there claws. A baby Dino trickster tricks some humans into getting a free boat ride and then it's mom eats a dog!

title: He sure has changed from the Tim Burton classic
review: This movie was much different from the Tim Burton version. Edward was not as nice with more anger in him. All those scars healed up fast and Winona Rider was asian

title: I didn't know this was his origin story.
review: I can't believe this is where he came from! Amazing prequel! Before he had claws on both hands and adopted the name Logan. The wolverine was known as Edward scissor hands and cut up kids in dreams! Johnny Depp gets sucked into his bed and becomes an alcoholic weirdo wearing jewelry and scarves !!!
